name: Stick Empires 2.0
description:
An unofficial Stick Empires version made by a group of friends that want to keep this game to be updated and enjoyable before it dies because as what we know, Flash is going to be unsupportable on browsers, and since Stick Empires a flash game, it will be playable on browsers that won't support flash (although we can still play it at the worst browser ever, aka Internet Explorer).

Rights Disclaimer: We do not own or claim to own anything related to Stick Empires or Stickpage. All content is owned and copyrighted by their respective owners, most likely including CrazyJay and Brock. This project is not monetized in any way. Huge appreciation for the great game that CJ and Brock made.

List of changes: 

- Resilience nerf (3000 - 2000)

+ Fire Range Buff (575 - 600)

- Fire burn slight nerf (0.808 - 0.8)

- V possess time nerf (20s - 25s (600 - 750))

- V mana cost nerf (100 - 250)

+Rage buff (60s - 45s(1800 - 1350)) 

+ Flying Crossbowmen renamed Albowtross

+ Albowtross range buff (625 - 800) 

- Pack Mentality nerf (50 gold - 200 gold)

+ Predatory Edge research nerf (60s - 70s (1800 - 2050)) 

- Nerf Albowtross range (800 - 725) 

- Marrowkai Reap time nerf (13s - 16s(360 - 480))

- V teleport time nerf (7s - 10s (200 - 300) 

+ Crawler speed upgrade fix (was 68 seconds, fixed to 70)

- Treature nerf (mana cost now150)

-Treature nerf (scorplings now cost 5 mana rather than 3)

-Treature nerf (scorpling spawn time increased ~1 second)

+ Scorch buff (50 dmg - 60 dmg)

+ Enabled "add friends" over anyone's profile

+ Players can now view anyone's replays

+ Added grasslands back, removed castle and added mountains instead

You do not have permission to send messages in this channel.

To play the game, drag the swf file into Flash player app file. The game should start running in a new window.

Download Adobe Flash Player:
 https://www.adobe.com/support/flashplayer/debug_downloads.html

Limitations:

  1. You cannot play “Play Match” or “Play DeathMatch” at all with this version of Stick Empires.
  2. You can only play with other people who are running this client.

Credits:

Developed by: Theoden(Manipulation), Antis(ArrowsofTime) & AsePlayer.

Website Design by: MakeSEGreatAgain (ICHAOSLORDI).
